hopobject.name: CHARTER Project Wirless ECG
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:12.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/12.0
hopobject.body: CHARTER aims to develop concepts, methods, and tools for embedded system design and deployment that will enable developers to master the complexity and substantially improve the development, verification and certification of critical embedded systems.
hopobject.shortdesc:
As part of the Artemis CHARTER project this a demonstrator project using a Beagleboard to show a wireless ECG trace and calculate heart rate.
The Beagleboard is running QNX as the RTOS and the software is developed using RTJava with Aicas JamaicaVM
